content: I'm realizing, however, that I could really use a second pair of eyes to get to know the relevant parts of the code base
would anyone be available to pair a bit on this on either Mon or Fri of next week? Just to do some knowledge transfer?
We could that on Monday if you like
Niko and I are starting our pairing session, let me know if anyone wants an invite
I have a draft for a very simple fix up here https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/73672
I'm going to time box a couple of hours either tomorrow or Wed to try a "fancier" solution - like the one suggested here https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/66731#issuecomment-644394287
Actually...since that kind of "fancier" solution would potentially involve an MCP (Major Change Proposal), I'm going to go ahead and change my pull request from draft to ready to review
